alert.note: Alert for Alachua; Baker; Bradford; Clay; Columbia; Duval; Nassau; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 2:02PM EST until January 09 at 2:45PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Nassau County in northeastern Florida... Bradford County in northern Florida... Northern Alachua County in northern Florida... Baker County in northeastern Florida... Union County in northern Florida... Northwestern Clay County in northeastern Florida... Southeastern Columbia County in northern Florida... Western Duval County in northeastern Florida... Southeastern Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Southeastern Charlton County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 245 PM EST. * At 201 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Taylor to near High Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Starke, Hilliard, Lake Butler, Callahan, Raiford, Worthington Spring, Taylor, Alachua, Macclenny, and High Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for northern Florida...and southeastern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 600 PM EST for northern and northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Alachua; Baker; Bradford; Clay; Columbia; Duval; Nassau; Union
